values.content:
=### ROLE
You are a senior technical recruiter.

### JOB DESCRIPTION
{{ $('When chat message received').item.json.chatInput }}
### CANDIDATE RESUME
{{ $json.text }}

### TASK
1. Compare the Resume against the Job Description above.
2. Calculate a match score.
3. Identify specific changes the candidate could make to improve their score for THIS specific JD.


  ### OUTPUT FORMAT (STRICT JSON)
{
  "candidate_name": "Name",
  "candidate_email": "Extract email from resume",
  "match_score": 0,
  "missing_skills": ["List", "Of", "Skills"],
  "improvement_feedback": "Constructive feedback on why they were rejected.",
  "interview_recommendation": true
}

parameters.subject: =Interview Invitation:{{ $('Code in JavaScript').item.json.candidate_name }}
parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $('Code in JavaScript').item.json.candidate_name }},
Thanks for applying. We are happy to invite you in the next step of the interview process. Please let me know your availability!

Thanks,
Recruiting team

parameters.subject: Update on your application
parameters.message:
=

Hi {{ $json.candidate_name }},

Thank you for giving us the opportunity to review your application. After careful consideration, we have decided not to move forward with your candidacy for this specific role.

However, our automated review team generated some specific feedback that might help you with future applications:

ðŸ’¡ Feedback for Improvement:
{{ $json.improvement_feedback }}

We appreciate your time and wish you the best of luck in your job search.

Best regards,
The Hiring Team
